Located in Antigua Guatemala, 21 miles from Miraflores Museum, Hotel Cristal has accommodations with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. The property is around 24 miles from National Palace Guatemala, 24 miles from Popol Vuh Museum and a 9-minute walk from Santa Catalina Arch. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms at the hotel come with a seating area and a TV with satellite channels. At Hotel Cristal the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Hobbitenango is 5.3 miles from Hotel Cristal, while Pacaya Volcano is 25 miles from the property. The nearest airport is La Aurora Airport, 24 miles from the hotel. This is our guests' favorite part of Antigua Guatemala, according to independent reviews.
